data.title: Pierre Wunsch
data.text:
Chairman of the Board of Governors of the King Baudouin Foundation

Profile

Born in 1967.

PhD in Economics (UCLouvain) and Master’s degree in Public and International Affairs (Princeton).

Active in various businesses and organisations:

Governor of the National Bank of Belgium

Member of the Governing Council and the General Council at the European Central Bank

Governor of the International Monetary Fund

Chairman of the Audit Committee/Director of the Bank for International Settlements

Member of the High Council of Finance.

Pierre Wunsch was formerly:

Vice-Chair/Member of the Board of Governors of the King Baudouin Foundation (2020-2022)

Chairman of the Management committee of Boost, the talent development programme of the King Baudouin Foundation (2019-2022)

Vice-Governor (2015-2019) and Director of the National Bank of Belgium (2011-2019)

Director of the "Cellule Stratégique des Finances" (2008-2011)

Various positions held within Electrabel (2004-2008) and Tractebel EGI (2001-2004)

Various positions in cabinets (1996-2001).
